blogPost.excerpt: • Check your latest website data in your menu bar • Number next to the Menu Bar Analytics icon shows the User visits in the current day • Use tabs to switch between 11 metrics • Google Analytics metrics are updated every 5min • Price $4.99 one-time
blogPost.body: • Check your latest website data in your menu bar • Number next to the Menu Bar Analytics icon shows the User visits in the current day • Use tabs to switch between 11 metrics • Google Analytics metrics are updated every 5min • Price $4.99 one-time
blogPost.title: Menu Bar Analytics for macOS - Check your Google Analytics data from your Mac's menu bar
blogPost.author: Vladimír Seman

localize.description: - 在菜单栏中查看最新的网站数据 - 菜单栏分析图标旁边的数字显示了当日的用户访问量 - 使用标签在11个指标之间切换 - Google Analytics指标每5分钟更新一次 - 一次性价格为4.99美元。
localize.tagline: 从Mac的菜单栏查看Google Analytics数据

localize.description: - 在菜單欄中查看最新的網站數據 - 菜單欄分析圖標旁邊的數字顯示了當日的用戶訪問量 - 使用標籤在11個指標之間切換 - Google Analytics指標每5分鐘更新一次 - 一次性價格爲4.99美元。
localize.tagline: 從Mac的菜單欄查看Google Analytics數據

previous.excerpt: Opal is your go-to app for Digital Wellbeing. Join thousands of people saving time daily, experiencing more productivity, better sleep, lower stress, and better focus each day. Use Opal to disconnect distractions from your phone & focus on what matters to you.
previous.title: Opal - Take control of your phone 💎📲

localize.description: Opal是您的数字健康应用的首选。加入成千上万的人的行列，每天节省时间，体验更高的生产力、更好的睡眠、更低的压力和更好的注意力。使用Opal，让你从手机中解脱出来，专注于对你来说最重要的事情。
Opal是您的數字健康應用的首選。加入成千上萬的人的行列，每天節省時間，體驗更高的生產力、更好的睡眠、更低的壓力和更好的注意力。使用Opal，讓你從手機中解脫出來，專注於對你來說最重要的事情。

next.excerpt: https://www.wingspan.app/ erases all the worst parts of freelancing– taxes, benefits, accounting, invoice & expense tracking, registering an LLC, even your tax withholdings. The ease and beauty of a payroll platform, but optimized for freelancers and independent professionals.
next.title: Wingspan - Invoices, benefits, and taxes for independent professionals

localize.description: https://www.wingspan.app/ 抹去了自由职业者所有最糟糕的部分--税收、福利、会计、发票和费用跟踪、注册有限责任公司，甚至是您的预扣税。薪资平台的易用性和美观性，但针对自由职业者和独立专业人士进行了优化。
localize.tagline: 独立专业人员的发票、福利和税金。

localize.description: https://www.wingspan.app/ 抹去了自由職業者所有最糟糕的部分--稅收、福利、會計、發票和費用跟蹤、註冊有限責任公司，甚至是您的預扣稅。薪資平臺的易用性和美觀性，但針對自由職業者和獨立專業人士進行了優化。
localize.tagline: 獨立專業人員的發票、福利和稅金。
